tasks.title: Install the "Shareable Kanban board" extension
tasks.description: Shareable Kanban board is available inside of Visual Studio Code

tasks.title: Learn advanced use of the shareable Kanban board
tasks.description: At the end I will know how to use efficiently this board

tasks.title: Learn using the shareable Kanban board
tasks.description: At the end I will know how to use efficiently this board

tasks.title: Learn to use the filtering of tasks in shareable Kanban board
tasks.description:
At the end I will know how to find tickets according to different criterion:
* assignee:
  * assignee: partial user name
* comment:
  * comment: partial phrase
* dependency:
  * dependency: partial ticket name
* done:
  * done: today
  * done: 3d
* due:
  * due: tomorrow
  * due: 10d
* priority:
  * priority: priority_name
* progress:
  * progress: 25%
  * progress: ?%
* status:
  * status: status name
* tag:
  * tag: partial tag name

Also that each criterion makes the selection even finer.
